XII.ii.3.A.2.e
.
Establishing Eligibility Based on SC Death
If death occurred in service, the
service must meet the definition of “active military, naval, or air service” as described in
38 CFR 3.6(a)
, and
death must have occurred before August 13, 1981.
Note
:  If death occurred in service, line of duty is
not
a factor.
Reference
:  For more information on death in service occurring after August 12, 1981, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 3.B.3.b
.
